references.paper_title: Graph neural networks in recommender systems: a survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of graph neural networks in recommender systems, which is highly relevant to the current study.

references.paper_title: Graph neural network for traffic forecasting: A survey
references.reason: This paper focuses on traffic forecasting using graph neural networks, offering valuable insights into a specific application domain of the technology.

references.paper_title: Molecular contrastive learning of representations via graph neural networks
references.reason: The paper delves into molecular contrastive learning using graph neural networks, illustrating the applications of this technique in a specific scientific domain.

references.paper_title: How powerful are k-hop message passing graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper investigates the capabilities and limitations of k-hop message passing graph neural networks, providing a theoretical foundation for understanding the limitations of these models.

references.paper_title: From continuous dynamics to graph neural networks: Neural diffusion and beyond
references.reason: This paper links continuous dynamics and graph neural networks, which is highly relevant to the proposed DRAGON framework.
